generated_body: In the article titled "The Real Reason McDonald's Keeps the Filet-O-Fish on Their Menu," the user is likely to find an exploration of the strategic and historical significance of the Filet-O-Fish sandwich within McDonald’s offerings. Additionally, the article could highlight how the Filet-O-Fish has evolved over the years and its role in the fast-food giant's overall menu strategy, though these insights remain speculative.
